synopsis.text:
The anime revolves around the tumultuous yet heartwarming relationship between Shi Miao and her older brother, Shi Fen. Despite attending the same high school, Shi Miao finds her brother's lazy, foolish, and unreliable nature utterly intolerable. Their contrasting personalities and Shi Fen's penchant for mischief result in constant squabbles between the siblings.

However, beneath their love-hate relationship lies a deep bond. Despite her violent tendencies and his knack for causing trouble, the two siblings only have each other to rely on. In times of crisis, Shi Fen transforms into a protective and caring brother, always striving to do what's best for his adorable younger sister.

Their daily lives are filled with endless teasing, explosive arguments, and unexpected moments of affection, creating a comedic and heartwarming narrative that keeps viewers guessing what will happen next. The story not only explores sibling love but also touches on themes of love and food, making it a delightful watch for fans of slice-of-life anime.
